text: I stumbled into the problem that I can't redefine variables. I understand why that is, but one particularly annoying instance of this is the throw-away `_` . So doing `_, s, _ = svd(A)` , can only be done in one cell if i understood correctly? Anyone else stumbled across this?

text: That sounds like a bug to me, but should be easy to fix. Would be worth opening an issue I think, I don’t see an existing one.
